message.body: Rylan watches coopers video over and over and over
Haha. Cooper loves it too. We need to talk soon. They are so cute right now aren't they?
Hopefully this weekend! Yes, so cute and funny. It's fun to watch them learn and put things together. Rylan really likes to push the limits, in a very cute way
Oh yeah. He started going to things and saying "no no no" and waving a finger. And still getting into them
Ha ha, love it! Rylan looks at you and smiles while he does no nos in slow motion. Little stinkers!
Yep. Either way they look right at you, smirk and break the rules
How many teeth does cooper have?
4 top. 2 bottom and getting 2 bottom back in. Coming in pretty good now
